description: SELinuxStrategyOptions defines the strategy type and any options used to create the strategy. Deprecated: use SELinuxStrategyOptions from policy API Group instead.

rule.description: rule is the strategy that will dictate the allowable labels that may be set.

seLinuxOptions.description: SELinuxOptions are the labels to be applied to the container

level.description: Level is SELinux level label that applies to the container.

role.description: Role is a SELinux role label that applies to the container.

type.description: Type is a SELinux type label that applies to the container.

user.description: User is a SELinux user label that applies to the container.
